entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 16 January 2023
